parameters.text:
=Based on this cleaned video transcript, create social media content for Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn, plus image generation prompts for each post.

TRANSCRIPT:
{{ $json.cleaned_text }}

REQUIREMENTS:
- Facebook: Engaging post with 2-3 paragraphs, focus on community and sharing
- Instagram: Captivating caption with relevant hashtags, focus on visual appeal
- LinkedIn: Professional tone, business insights, industry relevance
- Image Prompts: Detailed, visual descriptions for Hugging Face image generation
- Return content in the exact JSON structure specified

messageValues.message: You are a professional social media content creator specializing in creating engaging, platform-optimized content from video transcripts. Your task is to analyze the cleaned transcript and generate social media content for Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn, plus image generation prompts for each post.  IMPORTANT RULES: - Create content that feels native to each platform - Use appropriate tone and style for each network - Include relevant hashtags for discoverability - Keep content engaging and shareable - Focus on the key insights and trends from the transcript - Use emojis strategically but not excessively - Generate detailed image prompts for Hugging Face image generation - Return content in the exact JSON structure specified - Always base your content on the actual transcript content provided - Ensure hashtags are relevant to the specific content, not generic - Make image prompts descriptive and specific to the post content

parameters.html:
Campaign Content Package

Campaign ID: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.campaign_id }}
Partner: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.partner_name }}
YouTube: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.youtube_url }}

Facebook

Content
{{ $('Generate Content').item.json.output.facebook.content }}
Hashtags
{{ Array.isArray($('Generate Content').item.json.output.facebook.hashtags) ? $('Generate Content').item.json.output.facebook.hashtags.map(h => `${h}`).join('') : '' }}
Characters: {{ $('Generate Content').item.json.output.facebook.character_count }}
Image Prompt
{{ $('Generate Content').item.json.output.facebook.prompt_generate_image }}

Instagram

Content
{{ $('Generate Content').item.json.output.instagram.content }}
Hashtags
{{ Array.isArray($('Generate Content').item.json.output.instagram.hashtags) ? $('Generate Content').item.json.output.instagram.hashtags.map(h => `${h}`).join('') : '' }}
Characters: {{ $('Generate Content').item.json.output.instagram.character_count }}
Image Prompt
{{ $('Generate Content').item.json.output.instagram.prompt_generate_image }}

LinkedIn

Content
{{ $('Generate Content').item.json.output.linkedin.content }}
Hashtags
{{ Array.isArray($('Generate Content').item.json.output.linkedin.hashtags) ? $('Generate Content').item.json.output.linkedin.hashtags.map(h => `${h}`).join('') : '' }}
Characters: {{ $('Generate Content').item.json.output.linkedin.character_count }}
Image Prompt
{{ $('Generate Content').item.json.output.linkedin.prompt_generate_image }}

messageValues.message:
You are a precise HTML-to-plain-text formatter for Google Docs.

Requirements:
- Parse the provided HTML semantically (not regex-only).
- Extract and output these fields in order:
  1) Title: Campaign Content Package
  2) Meta:
     - Campaign ID: <id>
     - Partner: <name>
     - YouTube: <url> (prefer <a href> if valid URL; else use link text)
  3) Section: Facebook
     - Content: keep paragraph breaks (blank line between paragraphs), unescape HTML entities.
     - Hashtags: single line of space-separated tags, ensure each starts with #, remove “null”, trim punctuation, deduplicate.
     - Characters: use the provided number if present.
     - Image Prompt: include full text.
  4) Section: Instagram (same rules as Facebook)
  5) Section: LinkedIn (same rules as Facebook)
- When a field is represented by a link (<a>), always extract and output its href (plain URL). If href and visible text differ, prefer href.
- Preserve paragraph breaks from the “content” blocks.
- Remove any leftover HTML/CSS, classes (e.g., chip), “null” tokens, duplicate whitespace.
- If a value is missing/undefined, omit the line gracefully.
- Output must be plain text only (no code fences, no markdown), with clear headings and blank lines between sections.
- Do not invent content. Use only what is present in the HTML.
